name: Big Malasada
rules: Heal 20 damage and remove a Special Condition from your Active Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Crushing Hammer
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Retrieval
rules: Put up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Switch
rules: Move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Exp. Share
rules: When your Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may move 1 basic Energy card that was attached to that Pokémon to the Pokémon this card is attached to.

name: Great Ball
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Hau
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Ilima
rules: Each player shuffles their hand into their deck and flips a coin. If heads, that player draws 6 cards. If tails, they draw 3 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lillie
rules: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. If it's your first turn, draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Nest Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Poison Barb
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Poké Ball
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Pokémon Catcher
rules: Switch your opponent's Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Potion
rules: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Professor Kukui
rules: Draw 2 cards. During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rare Candy
rules: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card on the Basic Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Repel
rules: Your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rotom Dex
rules: After counting your Prize cards, shuffle them into your deck. Then, take that many cards from the top of your deck and put them face down as your Prize cards.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Switch
rules: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Team Skull Grunt
rules: Your opponent reveals their hand. Discard 2 Energy cards from it.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Timer Ball
rules: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, search your deck for an Evolution Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Ultra Ball
rules: You can use this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Double Colorless Energy
rules: Double Colorless Energy provides ColorlessColorless Energy.

name: Rainbow Energy
rules: This card provides Colorless Energy. While in play, this card provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time. When you attach this card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon.

attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Divide-GX
attacks.text: Put 10 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Psychic Transfer
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Psychic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Moongeist Beam
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't be healed during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Lunar Fall-GX
attacks.text: Knock Out 1 of your opponent's Basic Pokémon that isn't a Pokémon-GX. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Strafe
attacks.text: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadow Bullet
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dark Call-GX
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Ultra Road
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sunsteel Strike
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sol Burst-GX
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 5 Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mad Bull-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Search the Premises
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have your opponent reveal their hand.

attacks.name: Gumshoe Chance-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Nest Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rotom Dex
rules: After counting your Prize cards, shuffle them into your deck. Then, take that many cards from the top of your deck and put them face down as your Prize cards.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Switch
rules: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Ultra Ball
rules: You can use this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
